SLIDE_01.TITLE: Explore and find the best spot
SLIDE_01.DESCRIPTION: With just a few taps on your screen, discover the nearest parking lots and their real-time availability.

SLIDE_02.TITLE: Find parking quickly
SLIDE_02.DESCRIPTION: Explore nearby parking lots in real time, with information on availability so you can choose the best spot.

SLIDE_03.TITLE: Forget the stress of parking
SLIDE_03.DESCRIPTION: Our app simplifies your parking search so you can enjoy your time more.

ERRORS.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters
